name: Association of Dental Dealers in Europe
goal:
The purpose of ADDE as a non-profit oriented and non-partisan association is notably:
(i) to bring together the representative national dental dealer associations of all European countries that so desire;
(ii)to develop amongst its members a spirit of fellowship, moral support. For further information see the "Code of ethics for members of ADDE";
(iii) to foster an exchange of professional information an practical experience on technical an legal matters;
(iv) to pool their knowledge with a view to improve their general working conditions;
(v) to co-ordinate collective interests of both the dental industry and the dental trade in Europe;
(vi)to seek out factors likely to alter their situation in a beneficial way
(vii) to cooperatively make formal or informal representations at a European level, or request that members make these representations, or undertake all measures which the association seems beneficial to the professional interests of its members an to its organisation in general.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: ADDE follows the revision of the medical device directive and related policy fields. ADDE also participates in the Medical Device Expert Group and IMDRF- forum meetings.
